text: Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue is a TV show Power Rangers started in 2000. It is based on the Super Sentai series Kyuukyuu Sentai GoGoFive. It is the sequel to Power Rangers Lost Galaxy. A sequel to called Power Rangers Time Force started in 2001. ==Plot== Demons awaken. Five teens become the Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue to fight the demons and get New Zords. ==Characters== Actor Name Rangers Zord Sean Cw Johnson Carter Grayson Red Lightspeed Ranger Omegazord 1 Michael Chaturantabut Chad Lee Blue Lightspeed Ranger Omegazord 2 Keith Robinson Joel Rawlings Green Lightspeed Ranger Omegazord 3 Sasha Williams Kelsey Winslow Yellow Lightspeed Ranger Omegazord 4 Alison Maclnnis Dana Mitchell Pink Lightspeed Ranger Omegazord 5 Rhett Fisher Ryan Mitchell Titanium Ranger Lifeforce Megazord ==Cast== ===Rangers=== * Sean Cw Johnson as Carter Grayson, the Red Lightspeed Ranger. * Michael Chaturantabut as Chad Lee, the Blue Lightspeed Ranger. * Keith Robinson as Joel Rawlins, the Green Lightspeed Ranger. * Sasha Williams as Kelsey Winslow, the Yellow Lightspeed Ranger. * Alison Maclnnis as Dana Mitchell, the Pink Lightspeed Ranger. * Rhett Fisher as Ryan Mitchell, the Titanium Ranger. ===Supporting characters=== * Monica Louwerens as Ms. Angela Fairweather. * Ron Rogge as Captain William Mitchell. * Galaxy Rangers ** Danny Slavin as Leo Corbett, the Red Galaxy Ranger. ** Archie Kao as Kai Chen, the Blue Galaxy Ranger. ** Reggie Rolle as Damon Henderson, the Green Galaxy Ranger. ** Cerina Vincent as Maya, the Yellow Galaxy Ranger. ** Valerie Vernon as Kendrix Morgan, the Pink Galaxy Ranger. ===Villain=== * Jennifer L. Yen as Vypra. ==References== Category:Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Category:English-language television programs
title: Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue
